name: Sudoku
body:
# SuDoKu
## The Application
This application was made in Qt using c++ to create a fully functional Sudoku game and solver.
The application can generate puzzles, import puzzles from a tab-delimited input file, and have a user hand enter a puzzle.
The user can try to solve the puzzle, check if their solution is valid, or autosolve the puzzle

![](https://github.com/jrem090/SuDoKu/blob/master/Capture.PNG?raw=true)

## Compiling
The recommended way to compile would be to open the project file in QtCreator(it should have the relevant Qt Libraries) and build and run inside the creator.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
